item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1811; 10:53PM; 11223 W Lucerne Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yfCHIz; Del Rey; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E292 E43 E63 RA43 RA892 T5 T92; CH9; 1; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1811; 10:35PM; 11223 W Lucerne Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nGkiQy; Del Rey; One story, single family dwelling (under construction) with fire showing. There are four additional residences under construction on the lot which are exposed. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E292 E43 E63 RA43 RA892 T5 T92; CH9; 1; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1637; 09:58PM; 1052 W Upland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3afb2Q8; San Pedro; KNOCKDOWN: All active fire is extinguished and firefighters will continue to conduct mop up operations for any remaining hot spots. The fire was contained to less than one acre. No structures damaged and no injuries reported. No further details and no further updates are anticipated for this incident.; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 BC13 BC6 CW3A CW3B E101 E112 E248 E285 E290 E36 E38 E48 E85 EM13 H0D H0E H1 H2 H4 H5 H6 HA1 HA2 HA4 HA5 HA6 RA36 T85 T90; CH5; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1661; 09:47PM; 1018 S Westmoreland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yfpGPd; Pico-Union; A row of detached garages (at a two story apartment building) has at least three vehicles involved in fire. The fire is not impinging on the building. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and will handle with the resources on scene. No further updates are anticipated on this incident.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E13 E211 E226 E26 RA13 RA813 T11 T26; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1637; 09:37PM; 1052 W Upland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3afb2Q8; San Pedro; Approximately 1 acre of light fuels burning in Peck Park Canyon. No structures threatened at this time. ; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 CW3A CW3B E101 E112 E248 E285 E290 E36 E38 E48 EM13 H0D H0E RA36 T85 T90; CH5; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1566; 10:19PM; 6000 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R2MbzL; Woodland Hills; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters made significant progress and extinguished the majority of the large blaze in one hour and nine minutes. The remaining pockets of fire are difficult to reach with exterior hose lines and due to the structural instability, crews will remain in the defensive mode. Therefore this will continue to be an active, extended operation. Drivers are advised to avoid the area surrounding De Soto x Oxnard. LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section will handle the investigation per protocol. There are no injuries reported and no other structures damaged. No further details.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC14 BC15 BC9 CE59 CM42 E100 E106 E233 E239 E266 E28 E288 E289 E293 E296 E305 E39 E70 E73 E8 E88 EA1 EM14 EM9 HR3 RA105 RA106 RA39 RA84 T105 T33 T39 T66 T88 T89 T93 T96 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic - FATALITIES; INC#1549; 09:47PM; 19700 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AF5fhN; Winnetka; Final patient count is nine: three patients were determined deceased on scene. 25yo M, 30yo M and 30yo M. The remaining six patients (ages/genders not available at this time) all sustained *potentially* serious injuries due to the mechanism of injury but all were stable upon transport. Any further queries are referred to LAPD Inc# 3970. No further details.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E104 E273 E72 E87 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA100 RA104 RA107 RA70 RA72 RA73 RA84 RA87 RA93 T73; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1566; 09:37PM; 6000 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R2MbzL; Woodland Hills; This incident is now at the Major Emergency status with over 80 firefighters assigned. The building is fully involved and the structural integrity of the building is starting to fail along at least one corner. There are no injuries reported and no other structures threatened. Traffic will be heavily impacted in the area and drivers are advised to avoid the area. This will be an extended operation.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC14 BC15 BC9 CM42 E100 E106 E233 E266 E28 E288 E289 E293 E296 E305 E39 E70 E73 E8 E88 EA1 EM9 HR3 RA105 RA106 RA84 T105 T33 T66 T88 T89 T93 T96 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 18; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITIES; INC#1549; 09:01PM; 19700 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AF5fhN; Winnetka; Firefighters are on scene of a 3 vehicle collision with initial reports of 10 patients - Three patients are determined to be deceased on scene, seven additional patients are being evaluated with varying injuries. Additional resources requested. LAPD Inc# 3970; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E273 E72 EM15 EM17 RA104 RA72 RA84 RA93 T73; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1566; 09:10PM; 6000 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R2MbzL; Woodland Hills; One story, large (vacant) commercial building (approx 100' x 200') with fire through the roof. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. Two additional task forces requested. ; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC15 E100 E106 E293 E305 E73 RA105 RA106 RA84 T105 T93; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart
